mapper.insert: insert into db_pictureproject (SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', PICTURE, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, FLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, PICTUREID, DESCR) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictureid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_pictureproject set 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICTURE = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICTUREID = #{pictureid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', PICTURE, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, FLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, PICTUREID, DESCR from db_pictureproject where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', PICTURE, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, FLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, PICTUREID, DESCR from db_pictureproject
